Name: Alon Sacgiu
Notes: Killed when in the explosion of an explosive device hidden by Palestinians on a street in the camp, when he arrived at the scene and advanced on foot with other soldiers towards a military vehicle that sustained damage earlier when another explosive device detonated. Sixteen other soldiers were wounded in the two explosions. According to media reports, one sustained severe injuries and the others sustained light to moderate injuries.

Name: Diego Shvisha Harsaj
Notes: Run over by a Palestinian near the ‘Awarta checkpoint along with another soldier, who also died of his wounds the next day.

Name: Eliyah Hillel
Notes: Run over by a Palestinian near the ‘Awarta checkpoint along with another soldier, who also died of his wounds the next day.

Name: Ilay David Garfinkel
Notes: Wounded by shots a Palestinian fired at the minibus he was traveling in. Died of his wounds shortly after. Six other soldiers were wounded by the gunfire. The shooter was killed by a missile fired from an aircraft during a fire exchange between him and the soldiers.

Name: Ori Yaish
Notes: Fatally shot along with an Israeli citizen by an armed Palestinian who opened fire at Israelis in Reem (Masmiya) Junction. The shooter was fatally shot by a soldier. According to media reports, four other Israelis were wounded in the shooting, one critically and another severely.

Name: Shai Garmai
Notes: Killed when the military jeep she was riding in hit a roadside bomb when it entered the camp as part of a contingent of military and Border Police forces. Three other Border Police officers were injured in the explosion. During the clashes that broke out after Israeli forces entered, Palestinians fired and threw improvised explosive devices, Molotov cocktails and stones at them. A missile fired from an aircraft at a group of Palestinians, some of whom threw explosives and Molotov cocktails, killed six of them on scene and injured a minor who died of his wounds later.

Name: Avraham Fetena
Notes: Wounded by gunfire along with five other members of Israeli armed forces when three Palestinian Hamas military wing operatives opened fire on them at a checkpoint. Died of his wounds shortly after. The three Palestinians were fatally shot.

Name: Rose Lubin
Notes: Critically wounded when a Palestinian minor stabbed her and another police officer who was lightly wounded. The stabber was fatally shot by Border Police officers.

Name: Elchanan Klein
Notes: Fatally shot by Palestinians from a car that overtook his car on Route 557.

Name: Maxim Rizhkov
Notes: Killed when a device a Palestinians threw during a police and military incursion into the camp exploded. During the incident, the Israeli forces killed 13 Palestinians, and according to the media, at least nine members of the Israeli forces were injured.

Name: Maxim Molchanov
Notes: Killed when a truck driven by a Palestinian struck him. The Palestinian was then fatally shot by security guards at the checkpoint.

Name: Shilo Yosef Amir
Notes: Fatally shot by a Palestinian who fired at him and other Israeli soldiers from a car he was driving, when the soldiers stopped it for a security check. The Palestinian fled the scene and was shot and killed by Israeli soldiers and civilian security guards after a chase.

Name: Ido Baruch
Notes: Shot and killed by a Palestinian in a drive-by shooting while at a military post near the Shavei Shomron settlement.

Name: Noa Lazar
Notes: Shot and killed by a Palestinian who got out of a car at the checkpoint at the entrance to Shu’fat R.C. According to the military, a Ministry of Defense security guard was injured in the shooting. The shooter was shot and killed by security guards during a fire exchange at the entrance to the Ma’ale Adumim settlement on 19 October 2022.

Name: Bar Falah
Notes: Critically wounded by shots fired by two Palestinians, one of them a Palestinian Authority military intelligence agent, near the Jalameh/Mqeibleh Checkpoint, and died of his wounds shortly after. Both shooters were fatally shot by soldiers.

Name: Noam Raz
Notes: Severely wounded in the upper body by Palestinians' gunfire, in an exchange of fire during the withdrawal of military and police forces from the city. Died of his wounds a short while later. A Palestinian operative with the al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigades was wounded in the exchange of fire and died of his wounds on 15 May 2022 at a hospital in Israel.

Name: Amir Jiryes Khoury
Notes: Critically wounded when shot by a Palestinian who shot and killed two Israeli civilians and two Ukrainian citizens. Died of his wounds a short while later. The assailant was fatally shot by a police officer.

Name: Bar’el Hadaria Shmueli
Notes: Fatally wounded in the head by gunfire opened by a Palestinian standing on the other side of the perimeter fence, during a demonstration in which Palestinians threw stones at members of the security forces. Two Palestinians, including a 13-year-old, were wounded in the demonstration and died of their wounds several days later.

Name: Omer Tabib
Notes: Killed by an anti-tank missile that struck the military vehicle he was traveling in. Two other soldiers sustained moderate and severe injuries in the attack.

Name: Amit Ben Yigal
Notes: Critically injured by a heavy object thrown at his head by a Palestinian during a military incursion into the town. Succumbed to his wounds a short while later.

Name: Dvir Sorek
Notes: Stabbed to death. His body was found by the side of the road that leads to the yeshiva where he was a student, near the settlement of Migdal Oz.

Name: Gal Keidan
Notes: Stabbed by a Palestinian while guarding a hitchhiking station at the intersection by the settlement of Ariel. The assailant seized Keidan’s gun and used it to fire at him and at Israeli cars, critically wounding an Israeli civilian, who died of his wounds the next day. He then drove to the Gitai-Avisar junction. There, he fired at a bus stop, seriously wounding another soldier. The assailant was killed by the Special Police Unit on 19 March 2019 at the village of ‘Ebwein, Ramallah District.

Name: Yuval Mor Yosef
Notes: Severely wounded when shot by a Palestinian who got out of a car. He was at a bus stop near the settlement of Giv’at Assaf. He died of his wounds shortly after. Also injured were Yossi Cohen, a soldier who died of his wounds shortly after; another soldier who was very severely injured; and a civilian woman who was severely injured.

Name: Yosef Cohen
Notes: Severely wounded when shot by a Palestinian who got out of a car. He was at a bus stop near the settlement of Giv’at Assaf. He died of his wounds shortly after. Also injured were Yuval Mor Yosef, a soldier who died of his wounds shortly after; another soldier who was very severely injured; and a civilian woman who was severely injured.

Name: Aviv Levy
Notes: Hit in the chest by Palestinian gunfire from the other side of the Gaza perimeter fence, during the Return Protests. Succumbed to his wounds shortly after. The Israeli military stated that Levy was shot by a Palestinian sniper.

Name: Ronen Lubarsky
Notes: Critically injured by a heavy object that a Palestinian threw at his head, breaking his helmet, during an arrest raid at the refugee camp.

Name: Ziv Daus
Notes: Run over with another soldier while standing near a military post approx. 200 meters from the Ya’bad/Mevo Dotan checkpoint. According to media reports, two other soldiers were injured, one very seriously and one moderately.

Name: Natanel Kahalani
Notes: Run over with another soldier while standing near a military post approx. 200 meters from the Ya’bad/Mevo Dotan checkpoint. According to media reports, two other soldiers were injured, one very seriously and one moderately.

Name: Solomon Gabariya
Notes: Border Police officer. Shot dead by a Palestinian, along with two settlement security guards, as they were screening laborers at the entrance to the settlement of Har Adar. The shooter was shot dead by Border Police officers and the settlement security coordinator, who, according to the police, was moderately to seriously hurt in the incident.

Name: Hadas Malka
Notes: Three armed Palestinians arrived at the Damascus Gate in the evening, one of them carrying a gun. One fatally stabbed Malka near Damascus Gate and she died of her wounds later that day. The stabber was shot dead by Border Police officers. The other two Palestinians were shot dead by police and Border Police officers near Sultan Suleiman (Zidkiyahu) cave. According to media reports, one of them had attempted to stab officers and the other fired at them. Two other Palestinians were wounded by gunshots, one sustained moderate injuries, the other light ones. According to media reports, a Border Police officer was lightly wounded from shrapnel.

Name: Elhai Teharlev
Notes: Killed at a hitchhiking post at the Ofra Junction when a Palestinian driver swerved from his lane and hit him and another soldier. According to media reports, the soldier sustained mild wounds.

Name: Yael Yekutiel
Notes: Killed along with three other soldiers in a car ramming attack at the Armon Hanatziv Promenade. According to a statement by the Israel Police, 13 soldiers were also injured in the attack. The assailant was shot and killed by soldiers and a civilian who were at the scene.

Name: Shir Hajjaj
Notes: Killed along with three other soldiers in a car ramming attack at the Armon Hanatziv Promenade. According to a statement by the Israel Police, 13 soldiers were also injured in the attack. The assailant was shot and killed by soldiers and a civilian who were at the scene.

Name: Shira Tzur
Notes: Killed along with three other soldiers in a car ramming attack at the Armon Hanatziv Promenade. According to a statement by the Israel Police, 13 soldiers were also injured in the attack. The assailant was shot and killed by soldiers and a civilian who were at the scene.

Name: Erez Auerbach
Notes: Killed along with three other soldiers in a car ramming attack at the Armon Hanatziv Promenade. According to a statement by the Israel Police, 13 soldiers were also injured in the attack. The assailant was shot and killed by soldiers and a civilian who were at the scene.

Name: Yosef Kirma
Notes: A member of Israel Police’s Special Patrol Unit. Critically injured by gunshots fired by a Palestinian in East Jerusalem's a-Sheikh Jarrah neighborhood. He died of his wounds later that day. The Palestinian’s gunfire also killed an Israeli woman and, according to media reports, injured six other people. The shooter was shot dead by Border Police.

Name: Tuvia Yanai Wissman
Notes: Stabbed to death by two Palestinians in a supermarket.

Name: Hadar Cohen
Notes: Stabbed and shot to death by three Palestinians who assaulted her and other Border Police officers at Damascus Gate. The three Palestinians were shot dead by the Border Police officers. According to a statement by the Israel Police Spokesperson, another female officer was seriously wounded.

Name: Ziv Mizrahi
Notes: Stabbed and critically wounded at the gas station on Route 443, and later died of his wounds. The assailant was shot dead by soldiers.

Name: Binyamin Yakobovitch
Notes: Critically injured when run over while standing with a group of Border Police officers. The assailant who ran him over was shot dead by Border Police.

Name: Aharon Bennett (Banita)
Notes: Stabbed to death when he and his family were on their way to worship at the Western Wall. An Israeli civilian who tried to come to their aid was also killed in the incident. The assailant was shot dead by police.

Name: Almog Shilony
Notes: Stabbed by a Palestinian at the Hagana Train Station, Tel Aviv-Jaffa. He sustained mortal wounds of which he died later that day.

Name: Jad'an As'ad
Notes: Killed in car attack; he was run over at the Sheikh Jarah light rail station. An Israeli minor injured in the attack died of his wounds on 7 November 2014. The driver who perpetrated the attack was shot to death when, wielding a metal rod, he assaulted police cars.

Name: Natanel Maman
Notes: Critically wounded by a rocket hit his car while he was home on leave. He died of his wounds on 29 August 2014.

Name: Benaya Sarel
Notes: Killed with two other soldiers by Palestinian military branch operatives.

Name: Liel Gidoni
Notes: Killed with two other soldiers by Palestinian military branch operatives.

Name: Hadar Goldin
Notes: Killed with two other soldiers by Palestinian military branch operatives.

Name: Daniel Marash
Notes: Killed with four other soldiers by a mortar shell that hit a site serving as an assembly area for soldiers in the Eshkol Region.

Name: Omri Tal
Notes: Killed with four other soldiers by a mortar shell that hit a site serving as an assembly area for soldiers in the Eshkol Region.

Name: Shay Kushnir
Notes: Killed with four other soldiers by a mortar shell that hit a site serving as an assembly area for soldiers in the Eshkol Region.

Name: Noam Rosenthal
Notes: Killed with four other soldiers by a mortar shell that hit a site serving as an assembly area for soldiers in the Eshkol Region.

Name: Liran Adir
Notes: Killed with four other soldiers by a mortar shell that hit a site serving as an assembly area for soldiers in the Eshkol Region.

Name: Matan Gotlib
Notes: Killed with two other soldiers by an IED.

Name: Omer Hay
Notes: Killed with two other soldiers by an IED.

Name: Guy Algranati
Notes: Critically wounded by an IED. He died later in hospital. Two other soldiers were killed as well.

Name: Moshe Davino
Notes: Killed when a missile hit the tractor he was driving. The tractor was also the target of gunfire by military branch operatives.

Name: Daniel Kedmi
Notes: Killed with four other soldiers in a gun battle with Palestinian military branch operatives at a military outpost near Kibbutz Nahal Oz.

Name: Barkey Ishai Shor
Notes: Killed with four other soldiers in a gun battle with Palestinian military branch operatives at a military outpost near Kibbutz Nahal Oz.

Name: Erez Sagi
Notes: Killed with four other soldiers in a gun battle with Palestinian military branch operatives at a military outpost near Kibbutz Nahal Oz.

Name: Dor Deri
Notes: Killed with four other soldiers in a gun battle with Palestinian military branch operatives at a military outpost near Kibbutz Nahal Oz.

Name: Nadav Raimond
Notes: Killed with four other soldiers in a gun battle with Palestinian military branch operatives at a military outpost near Kibbutz Nahal Oz.

Name: Eliav Eliyahu Haim Kahalon
Notes: Killed with three other soldiers by a mortar shell that hit a site serving as an assembly area for soldiers in the Eshkol Region.

Name: Niran Cohen
Notes: Killed with three other soldiers by a mortar shell that hit a site serving as an assembly area for soldiers in the Eshkol Region.

Name: Adi Briga
Notes: Killed with three other soldiers by a mortar shell that hit a site serving as an assembly area for soldiers in the Eshkol Region.

Name: Meidan Maymon Biton
Notes: Killed with three other soldiers by a mortar shell that hit a site serving as an assembly area for soldiers in the Eshkol Region.

Name: Barak Refael Degorker
Notes: Critically wounded by a mortar shell that hit a site serving as an assembly area for soldiers near the border with the Gaza Strip.

Name: Guy Boyland
Notes: Killed with another soldier. According to media reports, they were killed in a gun battle with Palestinian military branch operatives.

Name: Amit Yeori
Notes: Killed with another soldier. According to media reports, they were killed in a gun battle with Palestinian military branch operatives.

Name: Guy Levy
Notes: Killed by an anti-tank missile.

Name: Ro'i Peles
Notes: Killed when an anti-tank missile hit the armored vehicle he was riding in.

Name: Avraham Grintzvaig
Notes: Killed by gunfire in a gun battle. Another soldier had been killed earlier by an anti-tank missile.

Name: Gal Bason
Notes: Killed by an anti-tank missile. Another soldier was later killed by gunfire in a gun battle.

Name: Liad Lavi
Notes: Sustained critical gunshot wounds in a gun battle with military branch operatives. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, the incident took place in the southern Gaza Strip.

Name: Paz Eliahu
Notes: Killed with two other soldiers by an IED. Another soldier was injured and died of his wounds on 31 August 2014.

Name: Lee Mat
Notes: Killed with two other soldiers by an IED. Another soldier was injured and died of his wounds on 31 August 2014.

Name: Shahar Dover (Dauber)
Notes: Killed with two other soldiers by an IED. Another soldier was injured and died of his wounds on 31 August 2014.

Name: Shahar Shalev
Notes: Critically wounded by an IED, which killed three other soldiers.

Name: Dmitri Levitas
Notes: Killed by gunfire. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was killed by a sniper in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh.

Name: Avitar Moshe Tourjeman
Notes: Killed in a gun battle with military branch operatives. According to media reports, he was killed by an anti-aircraft missile in the Khan Yunis District.

Name: Natan Cohen
Notes: Killed by gunfire. According to media reports, he was killed in a gun battle with Palestinian military branch operatives .

Name: Tal Yifrach
Notes: Killed together with another soldier. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, they were killed by IEDs in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh.

Name: Yuval Dagan
Notes: Killed together with another soldier. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, they were killed by IEDs in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh.

Name: Ohad Shemesh
Notes: Killed in a gun battle with military branch operatives.

Name: Hagai Ben Ari
Notes: Suffered a critical head injury during Operation Protective Edge, on 21 July 2014, when he was hit by a Palestinian sniper’s gunfire. He died of his injuries on 3 January 2017 never having recovered consciousness.

Name: Oded Ben Sira
Notes: Killed by gunfire. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was killed by a sniper.

Name: Kshaun Bayhesain
Notes: Killed by an anti-tank missile that hit the car he was riding near Kibbutz Nir. The missile was fired from an ambush of Hamas military branch operatives. Three other soldiers were killed as well. In the gun battle that ensued, ten armed Palestinians were killed.

Name: Yuval Haiman
Notes: Killed by an anti-tank missile that hit the car he was riding near Kibbutz Nir. The missile was fired from an ambush of Hamas military branch operatives. Three other soldiers were killed as well. In the gun battle that ensued, ten armed Palestinians were killed.

Name: Dolev Keidar
Notes: Killed by an anti-tank missile that hit the car he was riding near Kibbutz Nir. The missile was fired from an ambush of Hamas military branch operatives. Three other soldiers were killed as well. In the gun battle that ensued, ten Hamas operatives were killed.

Name: Nadav Goldmacher
Notes: Killed by an anti-tank missile that hit the car he was riding near Kibbutz Nir. The missile was fired from an ambush of Hamas military branch operatives. Three other soldiers were killed as well. In the gun battle that ensued, ten armed Palestinians were killed.

Name: Ben Itzhak Vaanunu
Notes: Killed in battle in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was killed with six other soldier when an anti-tank missile hit the armored vehicle they were riding in. This number includes a soldier pronounced dead by the military five days later, although his body was never recovered. Seven other soldiers were killed at the same spot that day.

Name: Tzafrir Baror
Notes: Killed in battle in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was killed with two other soldiers when an anti-tank missile hit the house they were in. Ten other soldiers were killed at the same spot that day.

Name: Tsvi Kaplan
Notes: Killed in battle in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was killed with two other soldiers when an anti-tank missile hit the house they were in. Ten other soldiers were killed at the same spot that day.

Name: Gilad Yacoby Rozenthal
Notes: Killed in battle in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh. According to media reports, he was killed with another soldier during a gun battle with Palestinian military branch operatives. Eleven other soldiers were killed at the same spot that day.

Name: Oz Mendelovich
Notes: Killed in battle in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh. According to media reports, he was killed with another soldier during a gun battle with Palestinian military branch operatives. Eleven other soldiers were killed at the same spot that day.

Name: Nissim Sean Carmeli
Notes: Killed in battle in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh. He was shot in a gun battle with Palestinian military branch operatives. Twelve other soldiers were killed at the same spot that day.

Name: Moshe Malko
Notes: Killed in battle in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was killed with two other soldiers when an anti-tank missile hit the house they were in. Ten other soldiers were killed at the same spot that day.

Name: Max Steinberg
Notes: Killed in battle in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was killed with six other soldier when an anti-tank missile hit the armored vehicle they were riding in. This number includes a soldier pronounced dead by the military five days later, although his body was never recovered. Seven other soldiers were killed at the same spot that day.

Name: Shahar Tase
Notes: Killed in battle in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was killed with six other soldier when an anti-tank missile hit the armored vehicle they were riding in. This number includes a soldier pronounced dead by the military five days later, although his body was never recovered. Seven other soldiers were killed at the same spot that day.

Name: Daniel Pomerantz
Notes: Killed in battle in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was killed with six other soldier when an anti-tank missile hit the armored vehicle they were riding in. This number includes a soldier pronounced dead by the military five days later, although his body was never recovered. Seven other soldiers were killed at the same spot that day.

Name: Shon Mondshine
Notes: Killed in battle in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was killed with six other soldier when an anti-tank missile hit the armored vehicle they were riding in. This number includes a soldier pronounced dead by the military five days later, although his body was never recovered. Seven other soldiers were killed at the same spot that day.

Name: Oren Simcha Noach
Notes: Killed in battle in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was killed with six other soldier when an anti-tank missile hit the armored vehicle they were riding in. This number includes a soldier pronounced dead by the military five days later, although his body was never recovered. Seven other soldiers were killed at the same spot that day.

Name: Oron Shaul
Notes: According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was in an armored vehicle that was hit by an anti-tank missile in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'iyeh. Although his body was never recovered, military authorities pronounced him dead, not MIA, five days later. Seven other soldiers were killed at the same spot that day.

Name: Bnaya Rubel
Notes: Shot dead in the Central District of the Gaza Strip. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was shot by a military branch operative who emerged from a tunnel.

Name: Bar Rahav
Notes: Critically wounded by a missile in the Central District of the Gaza Strip. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, the missile hit a military vehicle beside him. He did of his wounds later that day at Soroka Hospital.

Name: Adar Barsano
Notes: Killed by a missile that hit his car. The missile was fired from an ambush of Hamas military branch operatives. Another soldier was killed as well. In the gun battle that ensued, one of the Hamas operatives was killed.

Name: Amotz Greenberg
Notes: Killed by a missile that hit his car. The missile was fired from an ambush of Hamas military branch operatives. Another soldier was killed as well. In the gun battle that ensued, one of the Hamas operatives was killed.

Name: Baruch Mizrahi
Notes: An Israel Police chief superintendent. Killed by gunshots fired at his car. His wife was also wounded by the gunfire as was a 9-year-old boy who was a passenger in a nearby car.

Name: Eden Atias
Notes: Stabbed by a Palestinian teenager as the bus on which they were both passengers reached the Afula Central Bus Station. Died of his wounds later that day.

Name: Gavriel Kobi
Notes: Killed by sniper fire while standing at a checkpoint. Identity of shooter still unknown.

Name: Tomer Hazan
Notes: Came to Sanniriya in the company of co-worker from the restaurant where he was employed. The co-worker, a Palestinian resident of the village, strangled him to death and tossed his body into a cistern at the outskirts of the village.

Name: Boris Yarmulnik
Notes: Wounded by a mortar shell and died of his wounds the next day.

Name: Yosef Partuk
Notes: Killed when hit by a mortar shell.

Name: Natanel Moshiashvili
Notes: Killed during an exchange of fire with an armed Palestinian near the Gaza perimeter fence.

Name: Yehoshua Sofer
Notes: A policeman, he was killed by gunfire at a vehicle transporting police officers to work in the Hebron area.

Name: Eliraz Peretz
Notes: Killed in exchange of gunfire between the army and group of Islamic Jihad.

Name: Ilan Sabiatkovski
Notes: Killed in exchange of gunfire between the army and group of Islamic Jihad.

Name: Ihab Mufid Khatib
Notes: A Palestinian stabbed him in the chest with a knife while he was sitting in an army jeep, and when he tried to drive away, the vehicle overturned.

Name: Bashir Abu Samur
Notes: Non-commissioned officer in the IDF …

Name: Ro'i Rozner
Notes: Killed by an anti-tank missile during a military action.

Name: Omer Rabinowitz
Notes: Killed in an exchange of fire with armed Palestinians during a military action. Another soldier was lightly wounded in the incident.

Name: Amit Robenzon
Notes: Killed in the course of a military operation.

Name: Alexander Mashviski
Notes: Killed in an exchange of fire with armed Palestinians during a military action. Four other soldiers were wounded in the incident.

Name: Dvir Amnualuf
Notes: Killed in an exchange of fire with armed persons during a military action. Another 15 soldiers were wounded in the incident.

Name: Lutfi Naser a-Din
Notes: Killed while at an army post. Five other soldiers were wounded in the incident, one critically.

Name: David Shreiqi
Notes: Killed by a Palestinian who opened fire at Border Police standing near Lion's Gate, in the Old City.

Name: Matan Ovdati
Notes: Killed in an exchange of gunfire with armed men who approached the perimeter fence.

Name: Menhash al-Banyat
Notes: Killed in an exchange of gunfire with armed men who approached the perimeter fence.

Name: David Papian
Notes: Killed in an exchange of gunfire with armed men who approached the perimeter fence.

Name: Seif Bisan
Notes: Killed in exchange of gunfire with soldiers when he tried to sneak into Israel through the perimeter fence.

Name: Suliman 'Odeh Abu Judah
Notes: Killed when an explosive charge blew up near Kissufim Crossing, in which two soldiers were lightly injured.

Name: Liran Banai
Notes: Killed when an explosive charge blew up near Kissufim Crossing, in which two soldiers were lightly injured.

Name: Eran Dan -Gur
Notes: Killed in an exchange of gunfire with armed men in an operation in the Gaza Strip.

Name: Doron Assulin
Notes: Killed in an exchange of gunfire with armed men in an operation in the Gaza Strip.

Name: Rami Zuari
Notes: Shot by armed men at the northern entrance to the refugee camp.

Name: Ahikam Amihai
Notes: Killed by gunfire from a jeep while he was hiking.

Name: David Rubin
Notes: Killed by gunfire from a jeep while he was hiking.

Name: Ehud Efrati
Notes: Killed while walking armed.

Name: Ben Kubani
Notes: Injured in exchanges of fire that took place in the course of incursion to Khan Yunis. Died of his wounds later that day. An armed Palestinian was also killed in the same operation.

Name: Ben Zion (Haiem) Haneman
Notes: Killed in an exchange of gunfire with armed Palestinians during an army operation.

Name: Arbel Reich
Notes: Killed in an exchange of gunfire with armed Palestinians during incursion into the refugee camp.

Name: Kiryl Golenshein
Notes: Killed during an exchange of gunfire during an army incursion into the area.

Name: Ahmad Salman Abu Zqeiqah
Notes: Killed during an IDF operation searching for tunnel in the area.

Name: Ro'i Farjoun
Notes: Shot by a Palestinian while standing at a checkpoint.

Name: Osher Damri
Notes: Killed during an arrest operation in the city.

Name: Hanan Barak
Notes: Killed during an exchange of gunfire with armed Palestinians who infiltrate into an army post near Sufah crossing.

Name: Paval Slutzker
Notes: Killed during an exchange of gunfire with armed Palestinians who infiltrate into an army post near Sufah crossing.

Name: Ori Binamo
Notes: Killed in a suicide bombing in the checkpoint. Three soldiers and seven Palestinians were wounded.

Name: Nir Kahane
Notes: Stabbed in the neck while standing at a checkpoint.

Name: Yonatan Evron
Notes: Killed during an IDF arrest operation.

Name: Moshe Maor Jan
Notes: Killed in a suicide attack outside Hasharon Mall. About 90 people were injured in the attack.

Name: Avi Karouchi
Notes: Killed in an exchange of gunfire when two Palestinian militants opend fire at an army post.

Name: Dan Talasnikov
Notes: Killed during an IDF incursion into the village.

Name: Oded Sharon
Notes: Killed in a suicide bombing in Gush Katif.

Name: Ariel Bodeh
Notes: Killed by the gunfire of two Palestinians hiding on the side of the road.

Name: Yosef 'Atiyyah
Notes: Killed by the gunfire of two Palestinians hiding on the side of the road.

Name: Hussein Abu Leil
Notes: Killed in an attack on an IDF post near the Rafah crossing which included explosive devices and shooting.

Name: Adham Shihadah
Notes: Killed in an attack on an IDF post near the Rafah crossing which included explosive devices and shooting.

Name: 'Aref Azbarga
Notes: Killed in an attack on an IDF post near the Rafah crossing which included explosive devices and shooting.

Name: Tareq al-Ziadne
Notes: Killed in an attack on an IDF post near the Rafah crossing which included explosive devices and shooting.

Name: Sa'id Jahaja
Notes: Killed in an attack on an IDF post near the Rafah crossing which included explosive devices and shooting.

Name: Nadav Kudinski
Notes: Killed with his dog, in the Canine Corps, in an explosion while they were combing an area near Karni Crossing.

Name: Michael Chizik
Notes: Killed by mortar fire at the IDF pot in Morag.

Name: Moshe Elmaliah
Notes: Killed as result of shelling during a search in a tunnel along the Philadelphi route.

Name: Yair Nassim Turgeman
Notes: Killed by Palestinian gunfire while at the IDF post near Mevo Dotan.

Name: Viktor Ariel
Notes: An IDF medic who was killed when going to the aid of Shlomit Batito, a resident of Nitzanit, who had been shot by Palestinians.

Name: Gilad Fischer
Notes: Killed in an attack on the IDF observation post east of Beit Hanun.

Name: Tal Bardugo
